mapper.update:
update customer_appointment
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_time = #{workTime,jdbcType=DATE},
service_end_time = #{serviceEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
service_start_time = #{serviceStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ispickup = #{ispickup,jdbcType=INTEGER},
oppointment_time = #{oppointmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
count_finished_time = #{countFinishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
appointment_state = #{appointmentState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
consume_time = #{consumeTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dtype = #{dtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acc_finished_time = #{accFinishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where appointment_id = #{appointmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update customer_appointment set shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_time = #{workTime,jdbcType=DATE}, service_end_time = #{serviceEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, service_start_time = #{serviceStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ispickup = #{ispickup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, oppointment_time = #{oppointmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, count_finished_time = #{countFinishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, appointment_state = #{appointmentState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, consume_time = #{consumeTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dtype = #{dtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acc_finished_time = #{accFinishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER} where appointment_id = #{appointmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT c.*,p.* FROM customer_appointment c LEFT JOIN pet_appointment p ON c.appointment_id = p.appointment_id

SELECT c.*,p.* FROM customer_appointment c LEFT JOIN pet_appointment p ON c.appointment_id = p.appointment_id WHERE c.shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.work_time = #{workTime,jdbcType=DATE} order by oppointment_time
SELECT c.*,p.* FROM customer_appointment c LEFT JOIN pet_appointment p ON c.appointment_id = p.appointment_id WHERE c.shop_id = #{shopId} and c.openid = #{openid} order by oppointment_time desc
